website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Free TR 8 received mostly positive reviews. In general, people liked how comfortable it was and its versatility for a lot of physically demanding activities. Despite a few minor complaints, the shoe came highly recommended as a footgear for various fitness regimens.
pros: A vast majority of the users raved about how comfortable the cushioning was on the Nike Free TR 8
The trainer was versatile and perfect for cardio, HIIT, cross-training, weightlifting, kickboxing, and other strenuous activities, according to plenty of gym-goers
Several training enthusiasts liked that the snug fit of the upper provided adequate support
The lightweight nature of the footgear was enjoyed by a few testers
A handful of reviewers noted that the item’s flexibility was useful during plyometrics
The style and color options pleased a significant number of owners
One person was impressed at the product’s durability as it survived machine washing
cons: Some individuals wished that the laces were shorter
The high collar at the back caused chafing, ranted one purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought the TR8 in a different color from Nike website and loved them. I was looking for a black sneaker and was glad to find these. Pretty much the only place I could find them. These are MEN'S shoes and they do run a bit small. I wear a 9 or 9.5 in Women's Nike. I have 2 pairs of the TR8 in both a MEN'S 8 and 8.5. Both fit but I prefer the 8.5. The two white collegiate pair I have are holding up well in spite of throwing them is the washer and letting them air dry.
customer_reviews.author: JLHVR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great all around gym shoe! Verconfortavle and lighter than my Zoom Pegasus running shoes. Excellent for cross training, decent for weight lifting, and very good for running. They are also stylish enough for daily wear around town. The Free Train V8 is really a shoe for everything, I am very pleased with them! If you need a very good shoe that you can do any type of excercise with, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: SEA Dude

customer_reviews.title: Last pair of nikes
customer_reviews.text: I have worn nike shoes all my life they have always held up well, but unfortunately the last 3 pairs i have gotten have all fallen apart quickly the exact same way (The sole coming unglued). This pair has fallen apart the fastest. I'll repeat myself i have always bought Nike shoes but this will be the last pair i buy because their quality has gone down. What a shame if it wasnt for the soles coming unglued so easily I'd still only buy nikes since i love their shoes...... well i did. If you get these add some shoeglue to your cart you'll need it.
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great price
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews and was worried, I'd get a fake shoe or the wrong color or whatever other problems others said they had...These were perfect, as expected if I bought at a store, couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Russ H

customer_reviews.title: Very upset
customer_reviews.text: Sent MENS shoe NOT women’s! Very upset had to send back
customer_reviews.author: snshine74

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit of this specific Nike training shoes and this is my third pair..
customer_reviews.text: Thie first pair I ordered was a USA size 9-1/2 which is my normal Nike shoes size but encountered tightness at the opening when inserting my foot into the shoe. Therefore, in my next two pairs I ordered, I got a size 10 USA which is much more easier to insert my foot into it...
customer_reviews.author: Tito Moises S. Encinas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I am really hard on shoes and these are holding up very well after about a month of intense work (weights, plyos, ~2 mile runs, bike, etc). My ONLY gripe, is they are a tiny tiny bit narrow. This is alleviated my not tying them so tight through the middle of the foot, rather tying them tighter at the top of the shoe. Seriously, great shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around gym shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have wider feet and these fit perfect to size. They are stabilized enough for leg day and not still, so these shoes are great forshort distance running.
customer_reviews.author: J08hawks

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and the comfortability
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves them! He says they are way more comfortable than his adidas ultra bounce and his air max 270! He would recommend these to anyone if you just want a comfortable shoe to wear anywhere and everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mexi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort for busy nurse.
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves these shoes. He is a nurse and the comfort lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit. I bought a second pair of them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jones

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I got these to work out at home. All I had was running shoes and I wanted a more flat sole shoe to lift my weights at home. I think they are great shoes for weight training. Extremely comfortable for training compared to converse.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Salas

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a nice pair of Nike's that work in the gym, out for a run, or just daily wear and they are perfect! Fit great, snug but not tight. Super breathable & Flexible. Great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Borden

customer_reviews.title: Good cross trainers
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite cross trainers. They usually have held up well. Hopefully, this pair will do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Bezos

customer_reviews.title: My 18 year old loves these shoes for working out
customer_reviews.text: My son has a normal to wide foot and we weren’t sure if these would fit him properly, but they do.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa K. Weakland

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Trainers!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes...so much do that I purchased a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Blakley

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker just go up 1/2 a size...
customer_reviews.text: Go 1/2 size up! Your true size will be a tight squeeze. Looks exactly like the picture! Tons of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Milestone

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for serious weight trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight training shoe. I weight train 3-4 days a week for at least an hour. Great support, optimal flexibility. I’m really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Awkwardly Formal, Mildly Inappropriate

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair of Nikes. I've owned trainer and metcon models and these are by far the most comfortable pair and best fitting.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID PATLAN

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheers

customer_reviews.title: Might be a little tight for some
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little tight but don't really bother me if I'm out walking or doing stuff mind over matter I guess feel like I over paid but I like the first pair I have so yea and Nike said they didn't have any in stock and had a little spec of a scratche on the side that really not that noticeable if you really looking at it when recieveing this pair probly payed over price now but pretty much paid the same as the first pair when I got it over all some may or may not like it 😅 Goodluck on your purchase
customer_reviews.author: nobody

customer_reviews.title: Shoes came in wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes however I ordered size 8. 5 and got a size 8. I know the reviews were very specific to order a half size up. And I was deliberate to ensure I do this. However, the shoes came size 8 its too tight and I cannot wear it. I am very diapionted. Who will be paying for this mistake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes already on my 2 pair
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size larger cause they do come a little snug, so the one size up is perfect to me
customer_reviews.author: Rubencito Vman

customer_reviews.title: Solid Gym Shoe. Bad laces
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoes for the gym. Stable. Good for low mileage runs on the treadmill. Good support for lifting. HOWEVER, The lacing system is not good. After tightening and tying the laces for about 2 months, the plastic eyelet for the laces is beginning to break. As soon as the lace cuts through the eyelet, these shoes will be useless.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Durable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy shoe. Love the comfort combined with stability for lifting and cross training. Not the best shoes for a 10k but incredible for cross training. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy house shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. My husband ordered a second pair just to wear around the house so his feet wouldn’t hurt. They are very light and slip on and off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M Bearup

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Free Tr 8 Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: Running Shoes Man Nike NIKE FREE TR 8 AH9395-401
